194  template <int SecondWidth>
195  void GetMultiplied(const TMatrix<SecondWidth, Width, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<SecondWidth, Height, Element>& result) const
196  {
197  for (int resultY = 0; resultY < Height; ++resultY){
198  for (int resultX = 0; resultX < SecondWidth; ++resultX){
199  double sum = 0;
200  for (int i = 0; i < Width; ++i){
201  sum += m_elements[i][resultY] * matrix.m_elements[resultX][i];
202  }
203 
204  result.m_elements[resultX][resultY] = sum;
205  }
206  }
207  }
208 
212  template <int SecondWidth>
213  TMatrix<SecondWidth, Height, Element> GetMultiplied(const TMatrix<SecondWidth, Width, Element>& matrix) const
214  {
215  TMatrix<SecondWidth, Height, Element> retVal;
216 
217  GetMultiplied(matrix, retVal);
218 
219  return retVal;
220  }

412 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
413 TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::TMatrix()
414 {
415 }
416 
417 
418 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
419 TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::TMatrix(MatrixInitMode mode)
420 {
421  switch (mode){
422  case MIM_ZERO:
423  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
424  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
425  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
426  }
427  }
428  break;
429 
430  case MIM_ONES:
431  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
432  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
433  m_elements[x][y] = 1;
434  }
435  }
436  break;
437 
438  case MIM_IDENTITY:
439  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
440  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
441  if (x == y){
442  m_elements[x][y] = 1;
443  }
444  else{
445  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
446  }
447  }
448  }
449  break;
450 
451  case MIM_UPPER_TRIANGLE:
452  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
453  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
454  if (x <= y){
455  m_elements[x][y] = 1;
456  }
457  else{
458  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
459  }
460  }
461  }
462  break;
463 
464  case MIM_DOWNER_TRIANGLE:
465  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
466  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
467  if (x >= y){
468  m_elements[x][y] = 1;
469  }
470  else{
471  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
472  }
473  }
474  }
475  break;
476  }
477 }
478 
479 
480 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
481 TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::TMatrix(const TMatrix& matrix)
482 {
483  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
484  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
485  m_elements[x][y] = matrix.m_elements[x][y];
486  }
487  }
488 }

493 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
494 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::Reset()
495 {
496  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
497  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
498  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
499  }
500  }
501 }

543 {

548 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>

552  case 0:
553  return Width;
554 
555  case 1:

557 
558  default:
559  return 0;
560  }
561 }

568  case 0:
569  return (size == Width);
570 
571  case 1:
572  return (size == Height);
573 
574  default:
575  return false;
576  }

622 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
623 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::InitToIdentity()
624 {
625  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
626  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
627  if (x != y){
628  m_elements[x][y] = 0;
629  }
630  else{
631  m_elements[x][y] = 1;
632  }
633  }
634  }
635 }
636 
637 
638 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
639 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMaxElement() const
640 {
641  double retVal = m_elements[0][0];
642 
643  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
644  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
645  double value = m_elements[x][y];
646 
647  if (value > retVal){
648  retVal = value;
649  }
650  }
651  }
652 
653  return retVal;
654 }
655 
656 
657 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
658 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMinElement() const
659 {
660  double retVal = m_elements[0][0];
661 
662  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
663  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
664  double value = m_elements[x][y];
665 
666  if (value < retVal){
667  retVal = value;
668  }
669  }
670  }
671 
672  return retVal;
673 }

676 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
677 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetNegated(TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result)
678 {
679  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
680  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
681  result.m_elements[x][y] = -m_elements[x][y];
682  }
683  }
684 }

686 
687 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
688 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetAdded(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
689 {
690  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
691  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
692  result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] + matrix.m_elements[x][y];
693  }
694  }
695 }
696 
697 
698 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
699 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetSubstracted(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
700 {
701  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
702  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
703  result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] - matrix.m_elements[x][y];
704  }
705  }
706 }

708 
709 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
710 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetMultiplied(const TVector<Width, Element>& vector, TVector<Height, Element>& result) const
711 {
712  for (int resultY = 0; resultY < Height; ++resultY){
713  double sum = 0;
714  for (int i = 0; i < Width; ++i){
715  sum += m_elements[i][resultY] * vector[i];
716  }
717 
718  result[resultY] = sum;
719  }
720 }
721 
722 
723 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
724 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetScaled(double value, TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result) const
725 {
726  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
727  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
728  result.m_elements[x][y] = m_elements[x][y] * value;
729  }
730  }
731 }

734 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
735 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetTransposed(TMatrix<Height, Width, Element>& result) const
736 {
737  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
738  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
739  result.m_elements[y][x] = m_elements[x][y];
740  }
741  }
742 }

744 
745 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
746 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetFrobeniusNorm2() const
747 {
748  double retVal = 0.0;
749 
750  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
751  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
752  double value = m_elements[x][y];
753  retVal += double(value * value);
754  }
755  }
756  return retVal;
757 }
758 
759 
760 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
761 double TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetFrobeniusNorm() const
762 {
763  return qSqrt(GetFrobeniusNorm2());
764 }

767 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
768 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetColumnVector(int columnIndex, TVector<Height, Element>& result)
769 {
770  Q_ASSERT(columnIndex < Width);
771  Q_ASSERT(columnIndex >= 0);
772 
773  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
774  result[y] = m_elements[columnIndex][y];
775  }
776 }

778 
779 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
780 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::SetColumnVector(int columnIndex, const TVector<Height, Element>& columnVector)
781 {
782  Q_ASSERT(columnIndex < Width);
783  Q_ASSERT(columnIndex >= 0);
784 
785  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
786  m_elements[columnIndex][y] = columnVector[y];
787  }
788 }

790 
791 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
792 void TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetRowVector(int rowIndex, TVector<Width, Element>& result)
793 {
794  Q_ASSERT(rowIndex < Height);
795 
796  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
797  result[rowIndex] = m_elements[x][rowIndex];
798  }
799 }

801 
802 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
803 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::GetTriangleDecomposed(
804  TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& result,
805  TMatrix<Height, Height, Element>* matrixQPtr,
806  int maxColumns,
807  double minHhNorm) const
808 {
809  if (&result != this){
810  result = *this;
811  }
812 
813  int columnsCount = qMin(Height - 1, Width);
814  if ((maxColumns >= 0) && (maxColumns < columnsCount)){
815  columnsCount = maxColumns;
816  }
817 
818  for (int hhIndex = 0; hhIndex < columnsCount; ++hhIndex){
819  double hhNorm2 = 0;
820  for (istd::CIndex2d normIndex(hhIndex, hhIndex); normIndex[1] < Height; ++normIndex[1]){
821  double element = result.GetAt(normIndex);
822 
823  hhNorm2 += element * element;
824  }
825 
826  if (hhNorm2 < minHhNorm){
827  return false;
828  }
829 
830  double element0 = result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex)];
831 
832  double hhLength = (element0 >= 0)? qSqrt(hhNorm2): -sqrt(hhNorm2); // destination diagonal value of current processed column, sign is choosen optimal for maximal householder vector length
833 
834  double hhVector0 = element0 + hhLength; // element 0 of householder vector, rest of ist will be taken directly from matrix elements
835  double hhVectorNorm2 = hhNorm2 + hhVector0 * hhVector0 - element0 * element0; // sqare of norm of householder vector, first element replaced from original column norm sqare
836 
837  // correct next columns
838  istd::CIndex2d matrixIndex;
839  for (matrixIndex[0] = hhIndex + 1; matrixIndex[0] < Width; ++matrixIndex[0]){
840  matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
841  double dotProduct = result[matrixIndex] * hhVector0;
842  for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < Height; ++matrixIndex[1]){
843  dotProduct += result.GetAt(matrixIndex) * result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1]));
844  }
845 
846  double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
847  matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
848  result[matrixIndex] -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
849  for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < Height; ++matrixIndex[1]){
850  result.GetAtRef(matrixIndex) -= result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1])] * reflexionFactor;
851  }
852  }
853 
854  // correct optional matrix
855  if (matrixQPtr != NULL){
856  istd::CIndex2d matrix2Index;
857  for (matrix2Index[0] = 0; matrix2Index[0] < Height; ++matrix2Index[0]){
858  matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
859  double dotProduct = matrixQPtr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * hhVector0;
860  for (++matrix2Index[1]; matrix2Index[1] < Height; ++matrix2Index[1]){
861  dotProduct += matrixQPtr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])];
862  }
863 
864  double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
865  matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
866  matrixQPtr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
867  for (matrix2Index[1]++; matrix2Index[1] < Height; ++matrix2Index[1]){
868  matrixQPtr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])) * reflexionFactor;
869  }
870  }
871  }
872 
873  // correct current column
874  result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex), -hhLength);
875  for (int i = hhIndex + 1; i < Height; ++i){
876  result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, i), 0);
877  }
878  }
879 
880  return true;
881 }
882 
883 
884 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
885 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
886 {
887  bool retVal = true;
888 
889  static iser::CArchiveTag sizeTag("Size", "Size of matrix");
890  static iser::CArchiveTag cellsTag("Cells", "Values of matrix cells");
891 
892  retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(sizeTag);
893  if (archive.IsStoring()){
894  int width = Width;
895  int height = Height;
896 
897  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(width);
898  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(height);
899  }
900  else{
901  int width = 0;
902  int height = 0;
903 
904  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(width);
905  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(height);
906 
907  if (!retVal || (width != Width) || (height != Height)){
908  return false;
909  }
910  }
911 
912  retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(sizeTag);
913 
914  retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(cellsTag);
915  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
916  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
917  retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[x][y]);
918  }
919  }
920  retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(cellsTag);
921 
922  return retVal;
923 }
924 
925 
926 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
927 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator==(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix) const
928 {
929  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
930  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
931  if (m_elements[x][y] != matrix.m_elements[x][y]){
932  return false;
933  }
934  }
935  }
936 
937  return true;
938 }
939 
940 
941 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
942 bool TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator!=(const TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>& matrix) const
943 {
944  for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x){
945  for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y){
946  if (m_elements[x][y] != matrix.m_elements[x][y]){
947  return true;
948  }
949  }
950  }
951 
952  return false;
953 }
954 
955 
956 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
957 const typename TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::ElementType& TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator[](const IndexType& index) const
958 {
959  return m_elements[index[0]][index[1]];
960 }
961 
962 
963 template <int Width, int Height, typename Element>
964 typename TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::ElementType& TMatrix<Width, Height, Element>::operator[](const IndexType& index)
965 {
966  return m_elements[index[0]][index[1]];
967 }
968 
969
